26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_fuse_gf100.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:34 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31static u32
32gf100_fuse_read(struct nvkm_fuse *fuse, u32 addr)
33{
34 struct nvkm_device *device = fuse->subdev.device;
35 unsigned long flags;
36 u32 fuse_enable, unk, val;
37
38 /* racy if another part of nvkm start writing to these regs */
39 spin_lock_irqsave(&fuse->lock, flags);
40 fuse_enable = nvkm_mask(device, 0x022400, 0x800, 0x800);
41 unk = nvkm_mask(device, 0x021000, 0x1, 0x1);
42 val = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x021100 + addr);
43 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x021000, unk);
44 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x022400, fuse_enable);
45 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&fuse->lock, flags);
46 return val;
47}
48
49static const struct nvkm_fuse_func
50gf100_fuse = {
51 .read = gf100_fuse_read,
52};
53
54int
55gf100_fuse_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_fuse **pfuse)
56{
57 return nvkm_fuse_new_(&gf100_fuse, device, index, pfuse);
58}
59
